Package distibuted.interfaces

Interface AppServer

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientSocketHandler, StandardServerController
public interface AppServer extends Remote
This is the interface of a service-provider server to which a client can connect and disconnect

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ServerInterface
    connect(ClientInterface client)
    This method connects a client to the server
    void
    disconnect(ClientInterface client)
    This method disconnects a client from the server

  • Method Details

    • connect

      ServerInterface connect(ClientInterface client) throws RemoteException
      This method connects a client to the server
      Parameters:
      client - The client that asked to be connected
      Returns:
      the service provider interface this server manages
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurred reaching the remote object

    • disconnect

      void disconnect(ClientInterface client) throws RemoteException
      This method disconnects a client from the server
      Parameters:
      client - The client that asked to be disconnected
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurred reaching the remote object
